description: The definitive edition of the 『BLAZBLUE』 series, 「BLAZBLUE CENTRALFICTION」, is the most-played 2D fighting game in the world featuring with beautiful graphics and a well-designed, fighting system.
name: BLAZBLUE CENTRALFICTION Special Edition
intro: The definitive edition of the most-played 2D fighting game in the world featuring beautiful graphics and a well-designed, fighting system.
